interface.name: KeyboardFocusManagerPeerProvider
interface.javadoc: {@link KeyboardFocusManagerPeerProvider} is required to be implemented by the currently used {@link java.awt.Toolkit} instance. In order to initialize{@link java.awt.KeyboardFocusManager}, an instance of {@link KeyboardFocusManagerPeer}is needed. To create that instance, the {@link #createKeyboardFocusManagerPeer}method of the current toolkit is called.
Creates a KeyboardFocusManagerPeer for the specified KeyboardFocusManager.
